Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Central, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Central, Madison, Laramie, Jackson, and resume normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Jackson, Laramie, Madison, Central, Jackson,  and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Eastbound #87 87th Temporary Reroute near Buffalo/88th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted near Buffalo/88th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Buffalo, 88th, Mackinaw, 90th, Buffalo, and resume normal route, due to, street blockage near Buffalo/88th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Jefferson Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Jefferson Park.

Bus substitution will be available until 3:40PM between Harlem (O'Hare) and Jefferson Park. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
